This page displays all the notices on the system which await approval or denial

In each row, you can edit the title and description columns by double-clicking the text Choose the 'Approve'/'Deny' radio buttons to mark the notice accordingly

  • Click "Keep" to store changes
  • Click "Discard" to revert changes

Once satisfied with changes made, click the "Save Changes" button in the bottom right corner of the page to write changes to the database. The table will update if successful, otherwise you will be informed of an error.

Search

This page supports Chrome's 'find' feature. Simply press CTRL+F to begin searching
